meanings.sent1: The rubbered handle provided a comfortable grip.
meanings.sent2: The rubbered mat prevented slipping on the wet floor.
meanings.sent3: The rubbered umbrella bounced off the ground when dropped.
meanings.sent4: Her rubbered shoes hugged the pavement as she ran.
meanings.sent5: The rubbered coating on the tool made it durable and easy to clean.

meanings.sent1: The rubbered wheels of the bike absorbed the bumps on the road.
meanings.sent2: The rubbered tires provided a smooth ride on the rough terrain.
meanings.sent3: The rubbered car tires squeaked as they rolled over the gravel.
meanings.sent4: His rubbered bicycle tires glided silently on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The rubbered wheels of the skateboard gripped the surface for better control.

meanings.sent1: The rubbered ball bounced high when thrown on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The rubbered band stretched easily around the book.
meanings.sent3: The rubbered toy squeaked when squeezed tightly.
meanings.sent4: Her rubbered bracelet snapped as she tried to put it on.
meanings.sent5: The rubbered seal around the door kept the cold air out.
